title: Pykes...... off role? jungle!
body:
Generally champions want too be viable in two roles! Brand is a support mid laner, Diana is a mid laner or a jungler, pantheon is a jungler and a top laner, twitch is an adc jungler, the list goes on, but pyke is simply a support support in a game with the off chance to be autofilled shouldn't I be able to play my main champion in other places then just support? Like maybe in the jungle {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} Which brings me to small adjustments we could make to make him semi viable in the jungle without making him overpowered as a support or make him into a solo laner (eg. top or mid laner) 

The changes I'd recommend
1. Make it so his grey health can proc off monsters (ONLY MONSTER AND NOT MINIONS) This could also not work on epic monsters, too stop it from being too effective
2. Increase his attack speed  10% not a large amount just as much as the current attack speed micro runes give, too help him use Hunters machete 
3. NERF HIS ULT, I feel a large problem with pyke right now is he is SUPER SNOW BALLY, he literally get 2x the gold by killing one person with his ult, too make him a viable support assassin jungler he'd need this nerf or he'd be far too strong and just take over the game, revert his ult too what it used to be 

As a pyke main I'd like to play one of my favorite champions somewhere else on the off times I've been auto-filled {{sticker:vlad-salute}}   
So basically with these changes it'll give him jungle sustain while not effecting him in lane (exception of the added attack speed) and if anything nerf his solo laning capabilities as he isn't getting his e dmg too minions back and its also weakening his ult, I think would be a cool interesting addition too him! :)

{{champion:40}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:350}} {{champion:154}} 

all these champions would love to be as good as pyke is in off roles.

Yuumi as a solo laner is a terrible idea, and even worse as a jungler.
Zac basically only exists in the jungle, and sometimes not even there.
Rakan can sorta mid, but I'd argue it's about as viable as pyke mid, maybe less, since unlike pyke mid, rakan mid doesn't have any favourable matchups.
Janna top used to be almost viable, but then her auto attack damage and range got nerfed.


Pyke on the other hand, moonlights as an almost viable mid, a semi viable top, a weak but viable support, and it's not like you can't jungle with him either.
